articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to President of Serbia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to President of Serbia
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of sympathy to Tomislav Nikolic, president of Serbia, in connection with flood that hit Serbia, claiming human and material damage. 
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and consolations for the president, victims and bereaved families. 
					
					 It hoped that the Serbian government and people would eradicate the aftermath of the natural disaster as early as possible and bring the living of the people in the afflicted area to normal.

articles.title: Command of Southwestern Front of KPA Once Again Warns S. Korean Forces
articles.content:
Command of Southwestern Front of KPA Once Again Warns S. Korean Forces
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The Command of the Southwestern Front of the Korean People's Army released the following report Friday:
					 Running high is the resolution of all the officers and men under the Command of the Southwestern Front of the KPA to mercilessly retaliate against the military hooligans of Park Geun Hye who opened fire at warships of the KPA on their routine guard duty and peaceable Chinese fishing boats.
					
					 It is against this backdrop that the puppet military hooligans, not yet coming to their senses, spread false stories peppered with lies and hypocrisy in a bid to mislead public opinion.
					
					 In the afternoon of May 22, they made much fuss, floating misinformation that they opened fire in retaliation against the shells fired by the KPA at their warships in waters near Yonphyong Island.
					
					 They even staged the farce of sending a warning message on behalf of the chief delegate of the south side to the north-south general-level military talks in which they claimed the KPA side "made a provocative firing" in wanton breach of the Korean Armistice Agreement and the north-south agreements in a bid to label it a "provocateur" by telling sheer lies.
					
					 The confirmed fact goes to prove that warships of the puppet navy intruded deep into the waters of the DPRK side beyond the maritime guard demarcation line of the KPA side for preemptive firing under the pretext of intercepting the peaceable Chinese fishing boats and tried to convince the public that the shelling was made by the KPA.
					
					 The puppet military hooligans preempted the shelling but fabricated the above-said sheer lie. This gangster-like behavior proves what extent the Park Geun Hye group has reached in its confrontation hysteria.
					
					 No matter what rhetoric it may let loose, the group can never conceal nor get pardoned for its provocative preemptive shelling.
					
					 All the service personnel under the Command of the Southwestern Front are getting themselves fully combat-ready to mercilessly wipe out the puppet military hooligans keen on provocations in the name of all the Koreans.
					
					 Mounting high with the passage of time are their hatred at the provokers and their firm will to punish the group. They will certainly turn the sensitive area, a hot spot, into the first graveyard of the military hooligans of Park Geun Hye.

articles.title: CPRK Slams S. Korean Puppet Group for Cooking up "North Wind"
articles.content:
CPRK Slams S. Korean Puppet Group for Cooking up "North Wind"
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Friday in connection with the fact that the south Korean puppet group is going busy cooking up the provocative "north wind" to tide over the crisis caused by the ferry Sewol disaster:
					 The puppet conservative group's anti-DPRK smear campaign and provocative racket are aimed to cook up the "north wind", calm down the anger of the people of all social standings and their anti-"government" spirit running high with the Sewol tragedy as an occasion. They are also designed to divert elsewhere the public attention, tide over the current crisis, rally conservative forces in a bid to turn the situation ahead of the elections to local self-governing bodies in its favor.
					
					 It is a trite method employed by the group to cook up "north wind" at every election in order to tide over its ruling crisis and garner more votes.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is driven into the worst crisis due to the ferry sinking accident and the angry public is set to mete out stern punishment to the group of barbarous murders in the upcoming elections.
					
					 Finding the fate of its "government" at stake, the Park group is frantically resorting to the moves to cook up the "north wind".
					
					 This, however, will get it nowhere but only precipitate its self-destruction.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never remain an on-looker to the Park Geun Hye group's "north wind" campaign but will mercilessly punish those who hurt the dignity and the social system even slightly  and encroach upon the  sovereignty and territorial waters of the DPRK even a bit as it had already seriously warned.

articles.title: Chadian Figure Meets DPRK ambassador
articles.content:
Chadian Figure Meets DPRK ambassador
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are being deeply revered by the Patriotic Movement for National Salvation of Chad. 
					 The general secretary of the Movement said this when he met Jong Yong Chol, DPRK ambassador to his country, on May 15.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The Juche idea which was founded by Kim Il Sung and developed in depth by Kim Jong Il is the basic idea of our movement.
					
					 The Juche idea has won the sympathy of members of our movement since they were young.
					
					 It was a great immortal exploit that Marshal Kim Jong Un formulated their revolutionary ideas as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and proclaimed the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the supreme programme of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 The DPRK, a socialist country centered on the popular masses which regards independence as dearest is admired by the Patriotic Movement for National Salvation of Chad.
					
					 The Patriotic Movement for National Salvation of Chad and the WPK should support and solidarize with each other as they are engaged in the revolution in face of the moves of the hostile forces.
					
					 The movement will support the just cause of the WPK and boost the relations with it.

articles.title: Delegation of Mongolian People's Party Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Mongolian People's Party Leaves
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Mongolian People's Party led by Secretary General Munkhbat Jamiyan left here for home on Friday.

articles.title: DPRK Players' Group to Take Part in 17th Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Players' Group to Take Part in 17th Asian Games
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The Olympic Committee of the DPRK, as a member state of the Asian Olympic Council guided by the idea of peace, unity and friendship, decided to dispatch DPRK players' group to the 17th Asian Games slated to take place in Inchon, south Korea, from September 19 to October 4.
					 The DPRK Olympic Committee officially informed the Asian Olympic Council of the decision and will soon make necessary applications according to the rules set by the Council and the organizing committee of the Games.

articles.title: Anniversary of Historic Anti-Japanese Battle Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Historic Anti-Japanese Battle Marked
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- It has been 75 years since President Kim Il Sung led the battle in the Musan area of Korea to victory during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 This military operation in May 1939 was of weighty significance as it gave the great hope for national salvation to the Korean people in the face of the false propaganda by the Japanese imperialist aggressors.
					
					 Upset by the victorious advance of the Korean revolution, the Japanese imperialists had intensified their fascist repression of the Korean people and the "punitive" operation against the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) in the latter half of the 1930s. In the meantime they made a false propaganda that they "totally destroyed" the KPRA.
					
					 Under such situation, Kim Il Sung saw to it that the KPRA made a march from Nanpaizi to Beidadingzi in China to launch military actions against the Japanese imperialists in the homeland and instill the confidence in victory into the local people.
					
					After making full preparations for the advance into the homeland, through battles with the enemy in Beidadingzi, he set forth a policy that the main forces of the KPRA should advance into the Musan area.
					
					 Accordingly, the main forces under his command rapidly advanced into the area through Chong Hill, Konchang, Pegae Hill and Lake Samji and along the Kapsan-Musan guard road, built by the Japanese aggressors in an aim to keep the KPRA from advancing into Korea.
					
					 Then, Kim Il Sung gave an order that the forces should advance toward the Taehongdan area to conduct a big battle with the enemy as well as stage military-political activities in different areas.
					
					 The victorious Musan area battle gave an impetus to the overall Korean revolution centered on the anti-Japanese armed struggle and brought a new peak to the development of the national liberation struggle.

articles.title: Output of Kelp Increases in DPRK
articles.content:
Output of Kelp Increases in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Offshore farms in the DPRK are increasing the output of kelp.
					 More than 1 000 tons of kelp are produced on a daily average throughout the country.
					
					 In recent days, Pupho, Ongjin and Kumipho farms under the South Hwanghae Provincial Fishery Management Bureau on the west coast harvested about 15 000 tons of kelp.
					
					 The same is true of the fishery stations on the east coast. Kim Chaek, Ryongdae, Sinchang and other fishery stations and offshore farms are having a rich harvest of kelp through introduction of the advanced cultivation methods.

articles.title: First Weeding of Maize Fields Carried out at 90 Percent
articles.content:
First Weeding of Maize Fields Carried out at 90 Percent
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers and helpers of the DPRK are pushing forward weeding of maize fields while directing forces to rice-transplantation and other crops-planting. 
					 The first weeding of maize fields across the country was carried out at 90 percent. 
					
					 Cooperative farms in Pyongyang and North Phyongan Province finished the weeding of maize fields. 
					
					 Agricultural workers in Kangnam, Kongdong, Ryongchon and Cholsan counties are tending maize fields like flower gardens. 
					
					 Agricultural workers in Nampho City also finished the weeding as scheduled and started second weeding. 
					
					 Paechon, Jaeryong, Yonsan and Sohung counties in South and North Hwanghae provinces are weeding maize fields qualitatively. 
					
					 Farms in South Phyongan, South Hamgyong and Kangwon provinces are pushing ahead with weeding.

articles.title: All Efforts Called for Rice Transplantation
articles.content:
All Efforts Called for Rice Transplantation
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The organizations of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea are powerfully encouraging their members in rice transplanting campaign. 
					 The Central Committee of the union and its organizations are letting officials energetically push ahead with ideological education of the agricultural workers and giving helping hands to the farmers and rendering material support to them, contributing to registering successes in the campaign across the country. 
					
					 Officials of the union in South Hwanghae, North Phyongan and South Hamggyong provinces gave full play to enthusiasm among the members of the union. As a result, signal successes are reported every day.
					
					 North Phyongan Province's plan for rice transplanting is honored at 39 percent thanks to the efforts of the officials of the provincial committee of the union. 
					
					 The organizations of the union in Sinuiju City and Kwaksan County organized a socialist emulation among operators of the rice-transplanting machines, making it possible to ensure the rice transplanting with the help of machines at a high level.
					
					 Co-op farms in South Hwanghae Province honored their daily quotas for rice transplanting thanks to the frontline-style political work of the officials of the provincial committee of the union including broadcasting, use of flash news boards, emulation diagram and visual agitation.
					
					 The Anak County Committee of the union fully solved the issue of spare parts and materials needed to the repair and servicing of farm machines, thus helping the county take the lead in the nationwide rice transplanting. 
					
					 The Jagang Provincial Committee of the union effectively organized a socialist emulation among co-op farms and workteams, sub-workteams and other working groups.
					
					 Officials of the union in Pyongyang City, Hamju, Sukchon, Onchon and Anbyon counties have proved successful in the above-said agitation for successes in the rice transplanting campaign.

articles.title: News Analysis on Japan's Bid for Exercise of "Right to Collective Self-Defense"
articles.content:
News Analysis on Japan's Bid for Exercise of "Right to Collective Self-Defense"
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, Japan's Prime Minister Shinzo Abe formally expressed the stand to exercise the "right to collective self-defense" through revised interpretation of the country's Pacifist Constitution.
					 It meant that Japan will fundamentally change its security policy which has been abided by since its defeat in World War II.
					
					 The successive governments in Japan had so far maintained the principle that the "right to collective self-defense" is secured but not exercised under the Article 9 of its Pacifist Constitution, which bans Japan from possession of army and provocation of war.
					
					 However, the present government has stuck to the revision of the Constitution since its emergence, asserting that Japan should get rid of "postwar regime."
					
					 Such attempt has aroused a strong opposition from among the local people. 58 percent of the Japanese population stood against the revision of Article 9 in June last year and the figure increased to 61 percent in April this year, according to Tokyo Shimbun.
					
					 Upset by the rising public opposition, the government produced a counterproposal to exercise the "right to collective self-defense" through revised interpretation of the Constitution, veiling its scheme for military expansion with "positive pacifism".
					
					 What can not be overlooked are Japanese media reports that the proposal anticipated Japan's exercise of the said "right" on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Such attempt deteriorates the tension on the peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia caused by the U.S.-south Korea reckless war exercises and, accordingly, accusation against the Japanese reactionary government's militarist moves is growing stronger among the local and world people.
					
					 Japan's media, including Asahi Shimbun and Mainichi Shimbun, have bitterly criticized the present ultra-rightist conservative regime's militarist scheme over the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense. Tokyo Shimbun reported on May 18 that most of the respondents to opinion poll opposed the revised interpretation of the Constitution. 
					
					 Hankuk Ilbo of south Korea and news media of various countries were critical of Japan's attempt, contending that the Abe government started an action to turn Japan, a war criminal, into a state qualified to conduct a war and that militarism revived in Japan.
					
					 Japan had better drop such foolish design, mindful that it is as good as a suicidal act.

articles.title: KPA Determined to Punish S. Korean Military Provokers
articles.content:
KPA Determined to Punish S. Korean Military Provokers
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- An open report, made by the Command of the Southwestern Front of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on Wednesday, is now stirring up all the servicepersons' fixed will to annihilate the south Korean military provocateurs.
					 The report was issued as regards the fact that the south Korean military hooligans fired at KPA warships on a regular guard duty in the southwestern waters of the DPRK side and peaceable Chinese fishing boats.
					
					 So Tok Il, an officer of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force, told KCNA:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group in south Korea, driven into a corner by the ferry sinking disaster, tries to find a way out of its ruling crisis in confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 A club is fit for a mad dog and tiger moth fond of playing with fire is bound to perish in the flames.
					
					 We, airmen, are now hardening our will to wipe out the confrontation maniacs to the last one. 
					
					 An Chol Sam, a naval officer of the KPA, said:
					
					 It is clear that the Park group attempts to create "security unrest" for local elections by provoking a military clash in the most sensitive waters of the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 The KPA navy will make all the enemies fish feed without warning if they intrude into the territorial waters of the DPRK even 0.001mm.
					
					 Hwang Jong Bom, a non-commissioned officer of the KPA, said:
					
					 Not content with a racket about the "north's involvement in the drone case", the group of hooligans made a preemptive firing at the DPRK side this time. 
					
					 We will let the confrontation maniacs clearly see who will vanish under this sky. It is our fixed will to wipe out the Park-led military gangsters eager to provoke the DPRK.

articles.title: Japan's Bid to Exercise "Right to Collective Self-defense" Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Bid to Exercise "Right to Collective Self-defense" Slammed
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government officially clarified in its revised interpretation of the Constitution that it will tolerate the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense".
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary says this is little short of Japan's declaration of its intention to turn itself into a country that launches invasion and war as in the past.
					
					 The current Constitution of Japan is a product of the ardent desire and aspiration of the Japanese people and the international community not to see Japan becoming a war criminal state again, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Japan could enjoy an economic boom in a peaceful environment without war for nearly seven decades which is ascribable to the Constitution.
					
					 But the Japanese ruling forces are mulling allowing the exercise of the right, talking about "grim security environment" and "protection of lives and properties of the people".
					
					  Japan's intention to exercise the right is a declaration of its will to openly opt for aggression and war with the U.S.
					
					 The scenario of the Japanese government for the exercise of the right envisages "contingency" on the Korean peninsula, etc.
					
					 This means that Japan will hurl the troops of the "Self-Defense Forces" as an advance group and a shock brigade to the second Korean war to be provoked by the U.S. Through this Japan seeks to make a breakthrough towards realizing its old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere".
					
					 Such an attempt is like a suicidal act as it would invite a barrage of fire to the archipelago, the commentary says, warning that the Japanese government should bear in mind that the second defeat will be fundamentally different from what it sustained in the past.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Park Geun Hye Military Gangsters' Shelling
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Park Geun Hye Military Gangsters' Shelling
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- On May 20, gangsters of the south Korean puppet navy perpetrated such a grave military provocation as firing at warships of the Korean People's Army on routine guard duty in the southwestern waters of the DPRK side and peaceable Chinese fishing boats.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary brands this as a deliberate and premeditated grave provocation.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is an undeniable clear fact that the Park Geun Hye group, driven into the worst ruling crisis due to the ferry Sewol sinking disaster, is working hard to find a way out of it in escalating the military confrontation between the north and the south and igniting a war. 
					
					 The puppet warmongers' military provocation may lead to an all-out war against the north at any moment.
					
					 The Park group has gone the lengths of declaring that it would not rule out a war, an extreme phase. Under this situation the DPRK can never remain a passive onlooker to this provocation.
					
					 Park Geun Hye and the puppet military hooligans are the root cause of evils and misfortune of the nation as they are set to bring a disaster of a war to this land. 
					
					 The Koreans should rise up to make a clean sweep of these confrontation maniacs keen to perpetrate provocations against the north and bring about a nuclear disaster to this land.
					
					 It is necessary to settle accounts with the puppet military hooligans by force of arms right now as they are perpetrating provocative shelling in a back lane awkwardly and cowardly.
					
					 They should choose between the two options: to come out for a military engagement with the north or make an apology for the provocation against the north and completely halt it.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Talk Lacking Reflection on Mass Killings Rejected
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Talk Lacking Reflection on Mass Killings Rejected
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The Council for Round-table Conference of People from All Walks of Life to Cope with Ferry Sewol Disaster in south Korea in a commentary on May 19 denounced the deceptive "talk to the people" made by the puppet chief executive, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo.
					 In her talk Park Geun Hye made no mention about carelessness, irresponsibility and incompetency manifested in the ferry sinking accident, the commentary said, and went on:
					
					 She made neither mention nor reflection on the suspicion that Chongwadae was involved in media's spread of misinformation and the policy on thoughtlessly easing restrictions.
					
					 She avoided mentioning the attempt to walk away and take legal actions against citizens demanding the probe into the truth behind the disaster and punishment of those responsible. This cannot be interpreted as a truly responsible stand but it is a revelation of the intention to contain the people through hard-line steps.
					
					 In a nutshell, one can hardly understand for what Park would like to be responsible as there was no reflection in her talk.
					
					 The measures mentioned in the talk are not what should be immediately done by her, the commentary said, stressing that she should clarify how she is going to probe the truth together with the people, before taking a half-baked initiative.
					
					 People will never overlook Park seeking to shirk off the responsibility by making public the talk, the commentary noted, stressing that they would clarify for what she should take responsibility.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's "Talk to People" Censured
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's "Talk to People" Censured
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society released a commentary on May 19 censuring Park Geun Hye's attitude towards the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 Park's "talk to the people" neither mentions the demands of the bereaved families of the victims and families of those missing nor contains measures regarding those who are still missing, the commentary said, and went on:
					
					 She did not even mention the problems the maritime police and the Ministry of Security and Administration had in dealing with the disaster, what was their cause and the irresponsible attitude of Chongwadae for which she is directly responsible, in particular.
					
					 The irresponsible attitude and thoughtless remarks of Chongwadae and its group shocked the common people including the families of the victims, the commentary said, denouncing Park for evading responsibility and not reflecting on the country-selling ruling method.
					
					 It called for forming a committee for probing the truth made up of experts independent of "the government" and "the National Assembly" and thus clarifying the cause of the disaster and the "government's" response to the disaster and opening all this to public.

articles.title: Passive Response of Maritime Police to Ferry Sewol Disaster Disclosed
articles.content:
Passive Response of Maritime Police to Ferry Sewol Disaster Disclosed
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- South Korean KBS disclosed on May 19 the passive action taken by the puppet maritime police to  rescue passengers aboard the ferry Sewol.
					 Messages exchanged between the first patrol ship of the maritime police that arrived at the scene before any others after the accident and the command headquarters revealed the fact that the maritime police asserted it was impossible to have access to the ferry even though they knew that hundreds of passengers were still inside, the broadcasting said, and went on:
					
					 The patrol ship arrived at the scene of the accident at 9:30 when passenger cabins from the third to fifth floors were still afloat.
					
					 The headquarters should have made the captain and others who were all aware of the structure of the ferry and able to explain the course of exit and entry, etc. involved in the immediate rescue operation but instructed them to do so four hours after the occurrence of the accident.
					
					 Conveying this fact, KBS held the maritime police could not escape criticism that it was passive and careless in the rescue operation.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Urged to Find out Missing Persons of Sewol Sinking Accident to Last One
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Urged to Find out Missing Persons of Sewol Sinking Accident to Last One
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee of Families of the Victims, Those Missing and Survivors of the Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident in south Korea held a news conference in Phaengmok Port of Jin Island of South Jolla Province on May 20 demanding the puppet regime find out all missing persons to the last one, according to south Korean MBC.
					 The families of the victims of the disaster urged the regime to take steps to carry out the operation for looking for the missing persons to the last one, but Park Geun Hye did not mention it at all in a "talk to the people", the committee noted.
					
					 It demanded the regime track down the missing persons without fail.
					
					 It also underscored the need to reflect the opinions of the families of the victims in probing the truth about the ferry sinking accident.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Urged to Make Apology for Investigating Bereaved Families
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Urged to Make Apology for Investigating Bereaved Families
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- The Council for Round-table Conference of People from All Walks of Life to Cope with Sewol Disaster of south Korea made up of more than 500 civic and social organizations released a statement on May 20 denouncing the puppet authorities for making a belated apology to the bereaved families of victims and investigating them behind the scene. 
					 The statement said it was disclosed that the police persistently shadowed and investigated bereaved families of the victims of the ferry Sewol disaster. 
					
					 It was disclosed on May 19 that detectives of the Intelligence Section of the Tanwon Police Station in Ansan, Kyonggi Province shadowed bereaved families of victims, the statement said, and went on: In the morning the "president" made public a "talk to the people" expressing "apology" to the families whereas detectives followed and investigated the families in the evening. 
					
					 The police's act of shadowing and investigating those families means that they treat the families as "potential criminals" and proves that the police attach importance to the security of the "government", far from expressing sympathy with the pain of the families demanding urgent rescue and probe into the truth. 
					
					 The recently disclosed "government's" various forms of press censorship as regards the ferry Sewol disaster and the police authorities' investigation are part of evidence proving intelligence politics and red herring in different parts of south Korea reminding one of the days of military dictatorship. 
					
					 All facts go to prove that the problem is the attitude of the Park Geun Hye regime towards the ferry tragedy. 
					
					 The statement said the "government" and the "president" that behaved against the elementary etiquettes should make an apology for the investigation and shadowing and severely punish the chief culprit and those responsible for it at once.

articles.title: S. Korean Papers Slam Regime for Suppressing Families of Victims of Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Papers Slam Regime for Suppressing Families of Victims of Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, May 23 (KCNA) -- Papers of south Korea condemned the puppet regime's unethical suppression of the families of the victims of the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 Kyunghyang Daily News carried an editorial titled "The regime which is indifferent to missing persons and shadows bereaved families" on May 20.
					
					 The editorial said:
					
					 The bereaved families urged the regime to make every possible effort to rescue all missing persons, but there are already signs of forgetting the disaster.
					
					 This was manifested in the regime's attitude towards the bereaved families, and policemen of the Tanwon Police Station in Ansan, Kyonggi Province were spotted while shadowing representatives of the bereaved families.
					
					 As this is an obvious illegal investigation, the regime must probe the truth, severely punish those responsible and make an apology to the bereaved families.
					
					 Seoul Shinmun said in an editorial on May 22 that the police were taking lamentable actions after the disaster.
					
					 The editorial said:
					
					 The police were slow in investigating the ship owner, one of those responsible for the disaster but quick in investigating bereaved families.
					
					 Policemen of the above-said police station were spotted while shadowing bereaved families. Prior to it, a police officer in charge of gathering information was caught by bereaved families in the Jindo Gymnasium.
					
					 The shadowing and espionage are obvious abuse of power and illegal investigation.
					
					 This is nothing different from the activities of the police in the days of the past dictatorial regime that gathered in secret information about the tendency and the movements of the blacklisted persons and reported them to their superiors.
					
					 No progress is made in the investigation into the ship owner who embezzled a hundred billion won and neglected his duty.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente serbio
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente serbio
Pyongyang, 23 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 22 un mensaje de condolencias al presidente de la Republica de Serbia, Tomislav Nikolic, en relacion con que este pais sufrio perdidas humanas y materiales por las inundaciones.
					En la misiva, el remitente expresa profunda compasion y condolencias al destinatario, a las victimas y sus familiares y desea que el gobierno y el pueblo de Serbia estabilicen la vida de los habitantes de la zona afectada tras resarcir cuanto antes las consecuencias del desastre natural.

articles.title: Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del EPC advierte a la camarilla militar de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del EPC advierte a la camarilla militar de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 23 de mayo (ACNC) -- La Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 23 la siguiente informacion: 
					Llega al cielo el animo de venganza de todos los oficiales y soldados de la Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del Ejercito Popular de Corea, decididos a castigar implacablemente a los gangsteres militares de Park Geun-hye que dispararon balas y bombas hacia los buques del EPC en guardia rutinaria y los barcos pesqueros pacificos de China. 
					
					En tales circunstancias, los gangsteres del circulo militar surcoreano enganan la opinion publica difundiendo un rumor mentiroso e hipocrita sin volverse en si todavia. 
					
					Por la tarde del dia 22, iniciaron una propaganda mentirosa hablando como si la parte Norte hubiera disparado proyectiles contra buques surcoreanos en las cercanias de la isla Yonphyong y la parte Sur hubiera abierto el fuego de respuesta. 
					
					Para colmo, para justificar sus mentiras con el fin de tildar al EPC de "provocador", enviaron el llamado aviso de advertencia a nombre del delegado jefe de la parte Sur a las conversaciones militares a nivel de general Norte-Sur acusando al EPC como si este hubiera "cometido la provocacion de fuego" violando frontalmente el Acuerdo de Armisticio y el Acuerdo Norte-Sur. 
					
					Pero, se ha confirmado el hecho de que los buques de fuerzas navales surcoreanas, infiltrados en lo profundo de las aguas jurisdiccionales de la parte Norte de Corea pasando la linea de guardia maritima bajo el pretexto de controlar los barcos pesqueros pacifistas de China, abrieron primero el fuego y lo describieron como canonazo de la parte Norte. 
					
					Esta conducta gangsteril del circulo militar surcoreano, que inventa el absurdo rumor de "canonazo" del EPC sobre el primer fuego de si mismo, demuestra a que grado llega la fiebre conflictiva de la banda de Park Geun-hye. 
					
					El acto provocador de primer fuego no sera ocultado ni perdonado. 
					
					Todos los oficiales y soldados de la Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del EPC estan dispuestos a frustrar rotundamente, en nombre de toda la nacion coreana, las provocaciones de los gangsteres militares surcoreanos. 
					
					El odio y la voluntad de castigo de los oficiales y soldados de la Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del EPC, que crecen con el paso del tiempo, convertiran la zona maritima candente del Mar Oeste en la primera tumba de la camarilla militar de Park Geun-hye.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia "oleada anti-Norte" de banda surcoreana
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia "oleada anti-Norte" de banda surcoreana
Pyongyang, 23 de mayo (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada el dia 23 por la ACNC en relacion con que la banda titere del Sur de Corea se entrega a inventar la "oleada anti-Norte" de caracter provocativo para salir de la crisis causada por el caso de hundimiento del barco "Sewol", el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) dio la respuesta.
					 El objetivo de tal campana intrigante anti-RPDC y locura provocativa de la banda conservadora titere reside en calmar la colera de la opinion publica y el impetu de lucha antigubernamental aumentados por la tragedia del barco Sewol y evitar la actual crisis dispersando la mirada airada de la poblacion al inventar la "oleada anti-Norte", asi como en revolcar a su favor la situacion de las elecciones de autonomia local agrupando a las fuerzas conservadoras.
					
					Recurrir a la "oleada anti-Norte" en visperas de las elecciones para evitar la crisis de gobernacion y ganar votos es el metodo anacronico de la banda titere.
					
					 Ahora la horda de Park esta caida en la peor crisis debido a la tragedia del hundimiento del barco de pasajeros y la opinion publica indignada esta dispuesta a sentenciar severamente a los asesinos bestiales a traves de las proximas elecciones de autonomia local.
					
					 Al ponerse en el peligro el destino del actual "poder", la horda de Park recurre con frenesi a la invencion de la "oleada anti-Norte".
					
					 Pero, no obtendra nada con dicha maniobra y al contrario acelerara solo su autodestruccion.
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC no toleraran nunca tales maniobras de los compinches de Park Geun-hye y castigaran despiadadamente, como ya hicieron la severa advertencia, a los que atenten nuestra dignidad y regimen, nuestra soberania y territorio jurisdiccional.

articles.title: Comite olimpico de RPDC decide la participacion en 17o Juegos Asiaticos de Inchon
articles.content:
Comite olimpico de RPDC decide la participacion en 17o Juegos Asiaticos de Inchon
Pyongyang, 23 de mayo (ACNC) -- Como miembro del Consejo Olimpico Asiatico cuyo ideal es la paz, la unidad y la amistad, el Comite Olimpico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea decidio enviar la seleccion nacional a los XVII Juegos Asiaticos que tendran lugar del 19 de septiembre al 4 de octubre en Inchon del Sur de Corea.
					El Comite Olimpico informo oficialmente su decision al Consejo Olimpico Asiatico y formulara la solicitud necesaria segun el reglamento establecido por el Consejo y el comite organizador de ese evento.
